colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING  RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,, `AOm SVA STI, GZHUNG 'DI SLOB GNYER RNAMS LA PHAN SNYAM PAS, ,PAR 'DI KHU RE KHAMS TSAN ZHU RTEN NI, ,DGE BSHIS DGE SLONG YE SHES LEGS PAR BSKRUN, ,DGE BAS RGYAL BSTAN YUN RING GNAS PA DANG, ,DGE 'DUN THUGS MTHUN KHRIMS GTZANG BKA' PO TA LNGA, ,'CHAD NYAN YAR NGO'I ZLA LTAR 'PHEL RGYAS SHOG ,PAR 'DI KHU RE CHEN MO'I KUN DGA' CHOS GLING GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS, ,)
